publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2406Michael Matheson:Congratulations to the Thornwood Tenants and Residents Association—That the Parliament recognises the important role that tenants and residents associations have within local communities; congratulates the Thornwood Tenants and Residents Association for undertaking the Westfield estate residents’ consultation, which has highlighted the views and concerns of the local community, and calls on the local agencies to work in partnership with the association in addressing the issues highlighted by the consultation exercise. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2406 Congratulations to the Thornwood Tenants and Residents Association (lodged on 18 August 2008) Keith Brown*
